class.name: ImageTools
class.description: A singleton which handles various image processing tasks. Most methods accept an image as an input.

method.name: bucket_fill
method.description: Fills the area with a [code]fill_color[/code] confined by other opaque pixels. If [code]fill_image[/code] is [code]false[/code], the filled image chunk shall not overwrite the original image. The filled chunk is returned as another [Image] in all cases. [enum KernelConnectivity] specifies the flood fill algorithm. [constant KERNEL_FOUR_WAY] allows the filling pixels to go through diagonally placed opaque pixels and is slightly more efficient compared to [constant KERNEL_EIGHT_WAY].

method.name: replace_color
method.description: Replaces all occurrences of a given color with another one within the image.
